title: Businessweek Extra - Tom Colicchio
itunes:title: Businessweek Extra - Tom Colicchio
description:
Hosted by Carol Massar and Jason Kelly.

Featuring a conversation with Chef Tom Colicchio, Co-Founder of Gramercy Tavern, on the restaurant industry’s recovery from the coronavirus pandemic
